location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Government of India, to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Agent to the Governor General in Rajpootana [Rajasthan]

mods.abstract: Brief letter regarding the Persian Flag and proposing that they find out how much illustrations for one or two scenes of Pelly's planned book will cost.The letter also informs Pelly that the Governor-General is visiting the interior of India and that this is providing Aitchison with the opportunity to respond to his backlog of letters.
